title: Great remodeled 3-bedroom 2-bathroom house, garage and yard, pets nego
posting_body: Mazal55Properties
The house is bright all day, and has beautiful hardwood floors and period details.
The entry opens into a foyer which flows into a large living room that features an ornamental fireplace.
The living room leads to a formal dining room that subsequently leads to a large kitchen.
The kitchen features sky lights as well as built-in appliances which include a gas range, an oven, and a microwave oven.
Also included are a newer stainless steel dishwasher, and a newer stainless steel refrigerator.
The kitchen has a breakfast nook which opens to a bright atrium.
The entry foyer leads to a hallway which directly and separately accesses the kitchen and the atrium.
Also accessed from the hallway is a remodeled bathroom with a separate tub and stall shower, and the hallway ends at two large bedrooms.
One of the bedrooms directly accesses a large and private deck.
The house's main entry is one level above ground.
On the ground level is a large third bedroom with an en suite bathroom.
This room can be accessed from within the house, and can alternatively be used as a family or TV room.
There is also an adjacent laundry room on this level with appliances included.
The laundry room accesses a large and beautifully landscaped backyard.
The location is peaceful and quiet, yet close to restaurants and cafes on and around Judah Street.
It is also very close to the beach and to Golden Gate Park.
The MUNI train on Judah Street is just a block away for easy access to Downtown and many areas in between.
There is also easy access to the 280 freeway, and corporate shuttle stops on 19th Ave at Judah Street are near as well.
Pets are negotiable.
The garage and driveway can accommodate 1 to 2 cars.
Utilities are not included.
Laundry appliances are included.
The minimum lease term is 12 months.
Will be available from beginning September.
Mazal Bordo
Relocation Agent
